name: SHT1x
keywords: sensor, humidity, temperature, sht10, sht11, sht15, sht1x
description: Based on the SHT1x from practicalarduino, updated coefficients according to the v5 datasheet. Provides a simple interface to the SHT1x series (SHT10, SHT11, SHT15) and SHT7x series (SHT71, SHT75) temperature / humidity sensors from Sensirion
